tasks.title: Generate TypeScript Database Types
tasks.description: Generate TypeScript types from Supabase schema to enable type-safe database queries throughout the application

subtasks.title: Ensure Supabase is running locally
subtasks.description: Start local Supabase instance with 'npx supabase start'

subtasks.title: Create types directory
subtasks.description: Create types/ directory if it doesn't exist

subtasks.title: Generate database types
subtasks.description: Run: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > types/database.ts

subtasks.title: Verify types in Supabase clients
subtasks.description: Ensure lib/supabase/client.ts and lib/supabase/server.ts can import the Database type

acceptanceCriteria: types/database.ts file exists with complete type definitions
No TypeScript errors in lib/supabase/client.ts and lib/supabase/server.ts
Database type exports all table schemas

tasks.title: Implement Authentication System
tasks.description: Set up Supabase Auth with email/password and OAuth providers, create protected routes, and implement authentication UI components

subtasks.title: Create authentication context provider
subtasks.description: Build AuthProvider component using Supabase Auth hooks

subtasks.title: Build login/signup UI components
subtasks.description: Create LoginForm and SignupForm components with email/password fields

subtasks.title: Implement protected route middleware
subtasks.description: Create middleware to protect authenticated routes in Next.js

subtasks.title: Add OAuth provider configuration
subtasks.description: Configure Google and Microsoft OAuth in Supabase config

subtasks.title: Create user profile initialization
subtasks.description: Implement trigger to create profile record when user signs up

acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign up with email/password
Users can log in and sessions persist
Protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to login
Profile record is created automatically on signup
OAuth login works with Google and Microsoft

tasks.title: Set Up Redux Store and React Query
tasks.description: Configure Redux Toolkit store with slices for auth, donors, CRM, and AI state. Set up React Query for Supabase data fetching

subtasks.title: Create Redux store configuration
subtasks.description: Set up store/index.ts with Redux Toolkit configureStore

subtasks.title: Create authSlice
subtasks.description: Build store/slices/authSlice.ts for user authentication state

subtasks.title: Create donorSlice
subtasks.description: Build store/slices/donorSlice.ts for donor search and management

subtasks.title: Set up React Query provider
subtasks.description: Configure QueryClientProvider in app layout

subtasks.title: Create Supabase query hooks
subtasks.description: Build custom hooks for common Supabase queries using React Query

acceptanceCriteria: Redux store is configured and accessible throughout app
All slices are properly typed with TypeScript
React Query is configured with proper cache settings
Custom hooks for Supabase queries work correctly
DevTools integration works for debugging

tasks.title: Build Core Dashboard UI Components
tasks.description: Create main dashboard layout, navigation, and reusable UI components using Tailwind CSS

subtasks.title: Create DashboardLayout component
subtasks.description: Build main layout with sidebar navigation and header

subtasks.title: Build Navigation component
subtasks.description: Create responsive navigation with menu items and user profile

subtasks.title: Create reusable UI components
subtasks.description: Build Button, Card, Input, Select, and Modal components

subtasks.title: Build Dashboard home page
subtasks.description: Create dashboard overview with stats and recent activity

subtasks.title: Implement responsive design
subtasks.description: Ensure all components work on mobile, tablet, and desktop

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout renders with navigation
All UI components are reusable and properly typed
Design is responsive across all screen sizes
Tailwind CSS classes are used consistently
Accessibility standards are met (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)

tasks.title: Implement Donor Search and Intelligence UI
tasks.description: Create donor search interface and intelligence brief display components

subtasks.title: Create DonorSearch component
subtasks.description: Build search form with name and location inputs

subtasks.title: Build IntelligenceBrief component
subtasks.description: Create component to display AI-generated donor insights

subtasks.title: Add loading and error states
subtasks.description: Implement proper loading spinners and error messages

subtasks.title: Create donor list view
subtasks.description: Build table/grid view of searched donors

subtasks.title: Add search history
subtasks.description: Display recent donor searches for quick access

acceptanceCriteria: Users can enter donor name and location
Search triggers AI intelligence generation
Intelligence brief displays in structured format
Previous searches are accessible
Loading states provide clear feedback

tasks.title: Create Donor Intelligence Edge Function
tasks.description: Build Supabase Edge Function to orchestrate AI-powered donor research using Gemini API with OpenAI fallback

subtasks.title: Create edge function scaffold
subtasks.description: Run: npx supabase functions new donor-intelligence-generator

subtasks.title: Implement input validation
subtasks.description: Validate donor name and location inputs

subtasks.title: Add organization_id verification
subtasks.description: Ensure user belongs to organization and filter by organization_id

subtasks.title: Integrate Gemini API
subtasks.description: Call Gemini API for donor intelligence generation

subtasks.title: Add OpenAI fallback
subtasks.description: Implement fallback to OpenAI if Gemini fails

subtasks.title: Store results in donors table
subtasks.description: Save intelligence_data JSONB to database

subtasks.title: Add error handling and logging
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and logging

acceptanceCriteria: Edge function responds within 2 minutes
Gemini API is called successfully
OpenAI fallback works when Gemini fails
Results are stored with correct organization_id
RLS policies are respected
Errors are logged and returned with clear messages

tasks.title: Implement AI Service Integration Layer
tasks.description: Create service classes for Gemini and OpenAI integration with prompt templates and error handling

subtasks.title: Create Gemini service class
subtasks.description: Build lib/ai/gemini.ts with API integration

subtasks.title: Create OpenAI service class
subtasks.description: Build lib/ai/openai.ts with API integration

subtasks.title: Design prompt templates
subtasks.description: Create structured prompts for donor intelligence, relationship analysis, and engagement

subtasks.title: Implement rate limit handling
subtasks.description: Add exponential backoff and rate limit detection

subtasks.title: Add response parsing
subtasks.description: Parse AI responses into structured data format

acceptanceCriteria: Both AI services can be instantiated and used
Prompt templates generate appropriate AI responses
Rate limits are handled gracefully
Responses are parsed into consistent format
API keys are loaded from environment variables
